biotools.summary:
Modular toolchain for an extensible and customizable ETL pipeline that extracts, transforms, and loads clinical data and medical imaging metadata, applying dataset-specific mappings to generate outputs compatible with the EUCAIM Common Data Model (CDM). Its design aims to minimize manual data preparation efforts and facilitate customization and integration with other components, such as data quality assurance tools.
Containerized, currently supports input datasets in CSV, JSON, XLSX.
